```{r, include = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(KTPmars)
```

<p>

Mars Function:

```{r}
mc <- mars.control(Mmax = 10)
concrete <-mars(ConcreteCompressiveStrength~.,data=concrete,control = mc)
toxic <-mars(LC50~.,data=fishToxicity, control = mc)
yacht <-mars(RRPUWOD~.,data=yacht, control = mc)
```

<p>

Summary Function:

```{r}
summary(concrete)
summary(toxic)
summary(yacht)
```

<p>

Print Function:

```{r}
print(concrete)
print(toxic)
print(yacht)
```

<p>

Predict Function:

```{r}
predict(concrete)
predict(toxic)
predict(yacht)
```

<p>

Anova Function:

```{r}
anova(concrete)
anova(toxic)
anova(yacht)
```

<p>

Plot Function:

```{r}
plot(concrete)
plot(toxic)
plot(yacht)
```
